00010 #define URI_FLAGS_PARSE_PARTS     1
00011 #define URI_FLAGS_IS_ABSOLUTE_URI 2
00012 #define URI_FLAGS_IS_OPAQUE       4
00013 #define URI_FLAGS_HOST_IPv4       8
00014 #define URI_FLAGS_HOST_IPv6       16
00015 #define URI_FLAGS_HOST_HOSTNAME   32
00016 #define URI_FLAGS_HAS_SCHEME      64

00020 typedef struct tagURI {
00021   int  flags;
00022 
00023   char *cdata_raw;
00024   char *cdata;
00025   char *cdata_is_escaped; // each bytes says if corresponding byte has been escaped. could do this as a bit array, alas.
00026 
00027   char *scheme;
00028 
00029   char *userinfo_raw;
00030   char *userinfo;
00031   
00032   char *host;
00033   int   port;
00034   
00035   char *path_raw;
00036   char *path;
00037 
00038   char *query_raw;
00039   char *query;
00040   
00041   char *fragment_raw;
00042   char *fragment;
00043 
00044   char *opaque_raw;
00045   char *opaque;
00046 
00047 } URI;
00048 
00049 M_INLINE void URI_init( URI *url )
00050 {
00051   memset( url, 0, sizeof( URI ) );
00052   url->port = -1;
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 
00057 int URI_parse( URI *url, char *line);
00058 
00059 M_INLINE void URI_free( URI *url) {
00060   if (url->cdata_raw) {
00061     free( url->cdata_raw );
00062   }
00063 
00064   if (url->cdata) {
00065     free(url->cdata);
00066   }
00067 
00068   if ( url->cdata_is_escaped ) {
00069     free( url->cdata_is_escaped );
00070   }
00071   URI_init( url );
00072 }
00073
